detailsData.title: Statewide Reach
detailsData.content: Arash Law is a statewide injury law firm with a proven track record of success, offering services across California with access to the best medical specialists.

detailsData.title: 24/7 Availability
detailsData.content: Our staff of over 100 legal professionals is available around the clock, every day of the year, ensuring we're here whenever you need us.

detailsData.title: No Win, No Fee
detailsData.content: We operate on a contingency fee basis, meaning you don't pay unless we win your case and you receive compensation.

detailsData.title: Multilingual Service
detailsData.content: Our talented multilingual staff can communicate with you in your native language, offering services in English, Spanish, Italian, Farsi, Korean, French, and Hebrew.

valueProp: Our firm is one of the most widely-known and thriving California injury law firms with a legal team of over 100, who collectively give unparalleled customer service and results. Our firm’s sought-after trial attorneys have won multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlements in catastrophic injury & wrongful death cases.

testimonalData.text: Arash thank you for being so great to work with.
testimonalData.author: Jacob R.

testimonalData.text: I can’t even express in words how grateful I am and how incredible Arash and his team are.
testimonalData.author: Jullie G.

testimonalData.text: After getting in a horrible car accident, I called Arash Law and from the start, they made it an effortless and painless process for my case.
testimonalData.author: Matthew P.
